name: Blasphemous: The Board Game
description:
Blasphemous: the board game is a competitive adventure game. One to four Penitents will be sent by the Brotherhood of the Silent Sorrow on one of many available Pilgrimages. Each Pilgrimage deeply changes the land of Cvstodia through which the Penitents venture to solve quests, take down enemies, and unravel the plots hatched by the Miracle.
On their journey, the Penitents must work together to overcome deadly obstacles and mortal adversaries, but only one of them will be able to complete the Pilgrimage and achieve redemption (and victory) in the eyes of the Brotherhood of the Silent Sorrow.
Using an innovative dice evolution system, and with a powerful narrative component created by our friends at The Game Kitchen, Blasphemous: the board game lets you immerse yourself in the dark and fantastic world of Cvstodia, facing the most iconic bosses in the game, and meeting and interacting with all the characters that dwell within it.

—description from the publisher
